termsOfUse.intro: These Terms of Use govern your use of TrueMe mobile application and website (collectively referred to as the 'Service') operated by TrueMe Developers ('we', 'us', or 'our').
termsOfUse.agreement: By accessing or using the Service, you agree to be bound by these Terms of Use. If you disagree with any part of the terms, then you may not access the Service.

subsections.title: 1.1. Use License
subsections.content: We grant you a limited, non-exclusive, non-transferable, and revocable license to use the Service for personal and non-commercial purposes only.

subsections.title: 1.2. Data Privacy
subsections.content: Your privacy is important to us. Please refer to our Privacy Policy for information on how we collect, use, and disclose your personal data.

subsections.title: 1.3. User Consent
subsections.content: By using the Service, you agree to the collection, use, and disclosure of your personal data as described in our Privacy Policy.

subsections.title: 2.1. Skin Analysis
subsections.content: The Service may analyze user-provided pictures to determine potential skin conditions. However, this analysis is for informational purposes only and should not be considered a substitute for professional medical advice.

subsections.title: 2.2. Recommendations
subsections.content: The Service may suggest products and skincare routines based on the skin analysis. These recommendations are not a substitute for professional dermatological advice. We recommend consulting with a dermatologist before making any significant changes to your skincare routine.

subsections.title: 3.1. Consultation with Dermatologist
subsections.content: We strongly advise users to consult with a licensed dermatologist or healthcare professional regarding any skin concerns or conditions identified through the Service.

subsections.title: 3.2. Informed Decision-Making
subsections.content: Users should use their discretion and judgment when following any recommendations or advice provided by the Service. We do not guarantee the effectiveness or suitability of any products or routines suggested.

subsections.title: 4.1. Ownership
subsections.content: All content, features, and functionality provided by the Service are owned by TrueMe Developers and are protected by copyright, trademark, and other intellectual property laws.

subsections.title: 4.2. License Limitations
subsections.content: You may not reproduce, modify, distribute, display, or create derivative works of any content from the Service without our prior written consent.

subsections.title: 5.1. Disclaimer
subsections.content: The Service is provided on an 'as is' and 'as available' basis without any warranties, express or implied. We do not warrant the accuracy, completeness, or reliability of any content or information provided by the Service.

subsections.title: 5.2. Indemnification
subsections.content: You agree to indemnify, defend, and hold harmless TrueMe Developers and its affiliates, directors, officers, employees, and agents from any claims, liabilities, damages, losses, or expenses arising out of your use of the Service.

subsections.title: 6.1. Modification
subsections.content: We reserve the right to modify or replace these Terms of Use at any time. Any changes will be effective immediately upon posting the updated Terms of Use on the Service. Your continued use of the Service after any such changes constitutes acceptance of the new Terms of Use.
If you have any questions about these Terms of Use, please contact us at our emails: rockyangela5@gmail.com or romansaddi@gmail.com.
